mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.keyanxiangmu_uuid_number as keyanxiangmuUuidNumber ,a.keyanxiangmu_name as keyanxiangmuName ,a.keyanxiangmu_types as keyanxiangmuTypes ,a.keyanxiangmu_file as keyanxiangmuFile ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.xiaozhuchengyuan as xiaozhuchengyuan ,a.jiaoshi_id as jiaoshiId ,a.keyanxiangmu_yesno_types as keyanxiangmuYesnoTypes ,a.shenheyijian_text as shenheyijianText ,a.keyanxiangmu_content as keyanxiangmuContent ,a.keyanxiangmu_delete as keyanxiangmuDelete ,a.create_time as createTime
